title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 331.7 - Carriers not to supply names of authorized psychologists
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 331.7 - Carriers not to supply names of authorized psychologists

State Regulations

Insurance carriers shall not supply names of authorized
psychologists to their policyholders. Employers may secure a list of all
authorized psychologists in the vicinity of their places of business by
applying to the chair. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
331.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
